short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and organize articles for easy access and later reading.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Content Vault is a Chrome extension designed to help you save, organize, and revisit web articles. It serves as your personal web library, ensuring that valuable online content is always at your fingertips.

Key Features

a. One-click saving via context menu.

b. Customizable tagging system.

c. Efficient search and filter capabilities.

d. Read/unread status tracking.

How It Works

a. Add Content Vault to Chrome from the Chrome Web Store.

b. Right-click on any webpage or selected text and choose "Save to Content Vault".

c. Add tags, edit titles, or mark articles as read directly from the side panel.

d. Use the search bar or filters to quickly find saved content.

e. Click on any saved article to open it in a new tab.

Use Cases

a. Save research materials and study resources.

b. Organize industry news and reference materials.

c. Collect tutorials, recipes, or DIY guides

d. Save interesting articles for later reading.

Content Vault transforms how you interact with online content, turning Chrome into a powerful knowledge management tool. 

Say goodbye to lost bookmarks and forgotten articlesâ€”with Content Vault, your personal web library is always just a click away.
